title: Neck Stretching
description: Slowly tilt your neck to the right and hold for 15 seconds. Then repeat on the left side.

title: Shoulder Stretching
description: Pull your right elbow toward your chest and hold for 15 seconds. Repeat on the left side.

title: Wrist Stretching
description: Use one hand to pull back the fingers of your other hand to stretch the wrist and hold for 15 seconds.

title: Eye Exercise
description: The 20-20-20 rule: Every 20 minutes, look at something 20 feet (about 6 meters) away for 20 seconds.

title: Back Stretching
description: Stand up from your chair, reach your arms toward the ceiling and stretch your sides left and right.

title: Neck Rotation
description: Slowly rotate your neck clockwise, then counterclockwise. Repeat 3 times in each direction.

title: Shoulder Opening
description: Clasp your hands behind your back, open your chest and pull your shoulders back.

title: Deep Breathing
description: Take a deep breath in and slowly exhale while releasing tension from your shoulders. Repeat 5 times.

title: Wrist Rotation
description: Rotate your wrists slowly clockwise 5 times, then counterclockwise 5 times.

title: Arm Stretching
description: Raise your right arm over your head and pull your right elbow with your left hand for a stretch. Repeat the same method on the opposite side.
